message: Let's split this evenly, Bob. Seems fair to me!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, Bob, I'll give you a little more, but I'm not giving up too much. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to take the risk. This is my new proposal.
Okay Bob, I'm willing to give you 60, but this is my final offer, I won't go any lower. It's your call!
